com.yuti.regionbgm.client.music

Class BackgroundMusicManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yuti.regionbgm.client.music.BackgroundMusicManager

  • public class BackgroundMusicManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This manager allows the manage the music on client-side. (Load resource, stop music, etc...)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static BackgroundMusicManager instance
      Instance of the manager.
      com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.player.AudioPlayer player
      The player where the musics are loaded.
      BackgroundMusicTrackManager trackManager
      Manages the playlist of the BGM through the player.

    • Method Summary

      Send a PacketAskRefresh packet to the server to ask a refresh of the BGM.

      Play a musical resource on the client (triggered on client-side).

      Set the volume of the BGM

      • instance

        Instance of the manager.

        The player where the musics are loaded.

    • Method Detail

      • playResource

        public void playResource(java.lang.String resource,
                         boolean looping)
        Play a musical resource on the client (triggered on client-side).
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource you want to be played (an URL, youtube, twitch, almost anything)
        looping - Tells is the resource should loop or not

      • stopMusic

        public void stopMusic()
        Stops the music currently playing (triggered on client-side)

      • setVolume

        public void setVolume(int volume)
        Set the volume of the BGM
        Parameters:
        volume - Volume to set (between 0 and 100)

      • updateConfiguredMusicVolume

        public void updateConfiguredMusicVolume()

      • askForRefresh

        public void askForRefresh()
        Send a PacketAskRefresh packet to the server to ask a refresh of the BGM. It will mainly be used when a client reactivate the mod after disabling it, to keep it updated with the current region's BGM.

      • isPlayerActive

        public boolean isPlayerActive()
        Returns:
        true is a BGM is currently playing, false if not.

      • stopMinecraftMusic

        public void stopMinecraftMusic()
        Stops all vanilla Minecraft's music from playing.
